abstract: Basel Committee on Banking Supervision and the Financial Stability Board say the benefits of a safer financial system would outweigh the temporary reduction in economic growth related to requirements of an extra capital buffer at top banks.
snippet: The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision and the Financial Stability Board said the benefits of the plan would outweigh the temporary reduction in economic growth.
lead_paragraph: The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision and the Financial Stability Board said the benefits of the plan would outweigh the temporary reduction in economic growth.

headline.main: Regulators Defend Higher Bank Capital Plan
headline.print_headline: Regulators Defend Higher Bank Capital Plan
headline.seo: Regulators Defend Extra Capital Buffer for Banks
